name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080
description: High-end Blackwell GPU with 16GB GDDR7 memory and full DLSS 4.0 support. Perfect balance of performance and price for enthusiast 4K gaming and content creation.

reviews.review_text: The sweet spot for 4K gaming. Runs everything maxed out.
Great for Stable Diffusion. VRAM is sufficient for most models.
Solid upgrade from 3080. Night and day difference.
